text: The 1938–39 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Technology during the 1938–39 men's basketball season. The Dragons, led by 7th year head coach Ernest Lange, played their home games at Curtis Hall Gym and were members of the Eastern Pennsylvania Collegiate Basketball League (EPCBL). ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style=| Exhibition |- |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular season |- ==Awards== ;Bill Kulesh *EPCBL All- Conference Second Team ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball Drexel Dragons Men's Basketball
title: 1938–39 Drexel Dragons men's basketball team
